newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: RUGBY UNION-TWO NEW IRELAND CAPS FOR WESTERN SAMOA TEST.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-TWO NEW IRELAND CAPS FOR WESTERN SAMOA TEST.

text.p: Ireland on Thursday named two new caps for their one-off rugby union test against Western Samoa at Lansdowne Road on November 12.
Robert Henderson of London Irish will play his first test at centre while Ballymena's James Topping has won a place on the left wing.

Ireland: 15-Simon Mason; 14-Richard Wallace, 13-Robert Henderson, 12-Jonathan Bell, 11-James Topping; 10-David Humphreys, 9-Niall Hogan (captain); 8-Paddy Johns, 7-Denis McBride, 6-David Corkery, 5-Jeremy Davidson, 4-Gabriel Fulcher, 3-Paul Wallace, 2-Allen Clarke, 1-Nick Popplewell.
